clinical_study.brief_title: Circulating SIRT6 Expression, Effect on Aging Quality
clinical_study.official_title: Circulating Expression Measurement of a Sirtuin Protein Isoform, Sirt6, as an Early Marker of Aging Quality

brief_summary.textblock: This study follows the results of the COMPALICLAMP study (NCT00951392) where the investigators showed a differential expression of sirtuins protein isoforms, Sirt6, in muscle depending on the quality of aging. The investigators seek to confirm this difference in expression level of circulating leukocytes on a larger sample.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Volunteers from the SUVIMAX 2 aging cohort
- Men and women
- Older than 60
- Subject with a global aging quality score of 1 or 3 in the SU.VI.MAX. 2 study
- Covered by Health Insurance System
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject not in compliance with the recommendation of French National Law
